MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DD6 postcode area of Newport on Tay, affecting properties in Main Road and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:49 PM on Sunday, 31 January 2021
